title: I'm a F***ing Star: Get on Reality TV
description: This short but impressively in-depth book will take you from a nervous amateur to a seasoned pro who will have a much better chance at success when your interview comes around.Written by someone with years of experience in the business, with it you can nail that Skype interview and set yourself up for your dream career in show business.The Skype interview is common in the US and in I’m a F***ing Star – Get on Reality TV, you can learn how to avoid the pitfalls and common mistakes that will prevent you from being successful, with advice on:¬Casting opportunities¬Preparation¬Understanding the interviewer¬Doing some homework¬How to communicate properly
author: William Alexander
